title: "Artificial Intelligence used to enhance decision making during colorectal cancer surgery for first time"
excerpt: "A clinical research study published in the British Journal of Surgery shows that fluorescence guidance (where a fluorescent chemical compound re-emits light with a long wavelength) can enable a colorectal surgeon to assess cancer tissues visually and with more specificity in real-time during surgery,"
